subject: how to apply API testing using JUNIT?
msgSnippet: Hi, can any one help me out in testing java api using JUNIT. ia m quite new to this tool. I implemented a new HAVI API using JAVA....and i want to test this
messageBody:
Hi,

can any one help me out in testing java api using
JUNIT.

ia'm quite new to this tool.

I implemented a new HAVI API using JAVA....and i want
to test this API using JUNIT

....is it possible for me to test an API like HAVI
using JUNIT.

can anyone help me out in this type of testing.

regards,
siva
